thread.title: Very plaisant hotel
thread.title_full: Very plaisant hotel - Review of Midnight Hotel Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: christellelyon2016
title: Very plaisant hotel
text:
hotel very calm with nice decoration in the rooms
hotel very closed from transportations (metro, rer, trains)
staff is nice and stil want to help you
wifi is going well ( it is not often the case in h√¥tels from the same category)
breakfast room is too small
Room Tip: not very cheaper if you book early See more room tips
